page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: The block includes the steadings of the following farms:- {Carsewell Cornton {Brunstane Ravensneuk {Halls. Part of the{Auchencorth}land is also in the block, but the farm steading is outside the block. Most of the farming is mixed,with {sheep}and{beef cattle.}The main crops are{winter barley,spring barley,oats and{turnips.Hay}and{silage}are also produced.The arable land is worked by tractor_drawn or tractor-mounted implements.{Hens}are kept for egg production. On Harlaw Muir{dry-stone dykes {(walls)}form the farm boundaries. Fields are divided by{wire stock {fences, hedges}or{electric fences.
